name: Bombs Away! (saricden)
description:
Bombs Away!

Trijam 89 submission! Bombs are hidden deep within the mazes... It is your job to... Remove it! This time it took me about 3 hours 5ish minutes to complete, a little hard to say because my stream crashed! T_T

There are 9 levels. See if you can beat them all and get to the secret winner screen for winners only! Compatible with computers, phones, and tablets (note iOS has a couple bugs).

CONTROLS:

  • Tap / click and hold the bomb.
  • Guide the bomb out of the maze.
  • Don't touch the walls / let go or you will blow up.

 DEV LIVESTREAM:

(Note the stream crashes at about 2 hours T_T)

 SOURCE CODE:
